name: Andaman and Nicobar Islands
Greetings: Salaam! Discover the tropical paradise of Andaman and Nicobar Islands, savor the seafood platter, and explore the stunning Radhanagar Beach.

name: Andhra Pradesh
Greetings: నమస్కారం! Explore Andhra Pradesh, where you can savor the spicy Andhra Chicken Curry and visit the picturesque Araku Valley.

name: Arunachal Pradesh
Greetings: Nyarap! Discover Arunachal Pradesh's natural beauty, savor Thukpa, and explore the serene Tawang Monastery.

name: Assam
Greetings: Nomoshkar! Immerse yourself in Assam's tea culture, sipping on Assam Tea, and explore the lush Kaziranga National Park.

name: Bihar
Greetings: Jai Bihar! Explore the rich history of Bihar, savor the mouthwatering Litti Chokha, and visit the ancient Nalanda University ruins.

name: Chhattisgarh
Greetings: Chhattisgarh Ke Jai Ho! Dive into the culture of Chhattisgarh, where you can enjoy the spicy Chana Samosa and explore the beautiful Chitrakoot Falls.

name: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
Greetings: Jai Maa Bhavani! Explore the beauty of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, savor the delicious Farsan, and relax in the serene Dudhni Lake.

name: Goa
Greetings: Bom Dia! Experience the vibrant nightlife of Goa, savor Vindaloo, and relax on the beautiful beaches of Palolem.

name: Gujarat
Greetings: Kem cho! Taste the flavors of Gujarat with the delectable Dhokla and be awed by the intricate architecture of the Sun Temple in Modhera.

name: Haryana
Greetings: Sat Sri Akal! Experience the warmth of Haryana, where you can relish the flavorsome Bhutte Ka Kees and visit the historic Kurukshetra.

name: Himachal Pradesh
Greetings: Namaste! Experience the serene beauty of Himachal Pradesh, savor the delectable Chana Madra, and explore the breathtaking landscapes of Manali.

name: Jammu and Kashmir
Greetings: Salaam! Explore the paradise of Jammu and Kashmir, savor the mouthwatering Rogan Josh, and wander through the pristine Dal Lake in Srinagar.

name: Jharkhand
Greetings: Johar! Discover Jharkhand, the land of vibrant tribal traditions, and relish the delectable Thekua while exploring the serene Netarhat Plateau.

name: Karnataka
Greetings: Namaste! Discover Karnataka, home to diverse landscapes, historic ruins, and the Silicon Valley of India, Bengaluru!

name: Kerala
Greetings: Namaskaram! Visit Kerala, God's Own Country, and immerse yourself in its lush greenery and serene backwaters!

name: Lakshadweep
Greetings: Island Greetings! Explore the pristine islands of Lakshadweep, savor the catch of the day, and snorkel in the crystal-clear waters.

name: Madhya Pradesh
Greetings: Namaskar! Explore the heart of India in Madhya Pradesh, where you can savor the delicious Poha and marvel at the intricate carvings of the Khajuraho Temples.

name: Maharashtra
Greetings: Namaskar! Dive into the spirit of Maharashtra, where you can relish the lip-smacking Vada Pav and explore the vibrant streets of Mumbai, the City of Dreams.

name: Manipur
Greetings: Namaskar! Experience the beauty of Manipur, where you can savor Eromba and discover the serene Loktak Lake.

name: Meghalaya
Greetings: Khublei! Explore the abode of clouds in Meghalaya, savor Jadoh, and trek through the mesmerizing living root bridges of Cherrapunji.

name: Mizoram
Greetings: Hello! Discover the beauty of Mizoram, where you can relish Bamboo Shoot Curry and explore the serene Murlen National Park.

name: Nagaland
Greetings: Aloha! Dive into Nagaland's rich culture, savor Smoked Pork with Bamboo Shoot, and explore the picturesque Dzükou Valley.

name: Odisha
Greetings: Namaskar! Explore the cultural tapestry of Odisha, where you can savor the scrumptious Dalma and visit the historic Sun Temple in Konark.

name: Puducherry
Greetings: Bonjour! Experience the French influence in Puducherry, savor Creole-inspired cuisine, and relax on the serene Promenade Beach.

name: Punjab
Greetings: Sat Sri Akal! Feast on the hearty Punjabi Butter Chicken and experience the grandeur of the Golden Temple in Amritsar.

name: Rajasthan
Greetings: Namaskar! Experience the royal grandeur of Rajasthan, where every corner whispers tales of valor and opulence!

name: Sikkim
Greetings: Jasho! Explore the land of mountains in Sikkim, savor Thukpa, and trek to the breathtaking Kanchenjunga Base Camp.

name: Tamil Nadu
Greetings: Vanakkam! Discover Tamil Nadu, the land of the crispy Masala Dosa, and lose yourself in the timeless beauty of the Meenakshi Temple in Madurai.

name: Telangana
Greetings: Namaskaram! Explore Telangana, savor Hyderabadi Biryani, and dive into the charm of Hyderabad!

name: Tripura
Greetings: Sagolmang! Explore the beauty of Tripura, savor Mui Borok, and visit the stunning Neermahal Palace on Rudrasagar Lake.

name: Uttar Pradesh
Greetings: Namaste! Experience the heart of India in Uttar Pradesh, home to the delectable Tunday Kababi and the iconic Taj Mahal in Agra.

name: Uttarakhand
Greetings: Namaskar! Discover the natural wonders of Uttarakhand, savor Aloo Ke Gutke, and trek to the enchanting Valley of Flowers.

name: West Bengal
Greetings: Nomoshkar! Immerse yourself in the cultural delight of West Bengal, where you can savor the sweet Rosogolla and marvel at the beauty of the Victoria Memorial in Kolkata.

name: Chandigarh
Greetings: Sat Sri Akal! Discover Chandigarh's modern architecture, savor the spicy Aloo Paratha, and visit the beautiful Rock Garden.

name: Lakshadweep
Greetings: Island Greetings! Explore the pristine islands of Lakshadweep, savor the catch of the day, and snorkel in the crystal-clear waters.
